item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It may be unfair, but what happens in a few days, sometimes even a single day, can change the course of a whole lifetime..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "For you, a thousand times over" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Tori Amos
item.description: "Get off the cross, we need the wood." -- Tori Amos

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Tori Amos
item.description: "Sometimes I breathe you in and I know you know." -- Tori Amos

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Jen Lancaster
item.description:
"If you're anorexic, you're doing it wrong."
I swat him with a dish towel. "No, no, I mean anorexics look in the mirror, and even if they're eighty pounds, they still see a fat girl. I'm a hundred pounds heavier than I was in high school, my veins are full of creme fraiche, and yet I look in the mirror, take in the hair and makeup, and think, Damn, baby, you fiiine." -- Jen Lancaster

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Iyanla Vanzant
item.description: " choice is a divine teacher, for when we choose we learn that nothing is ever put in our path without a reason." -- Iyanla Vanzant

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description:
"On Undecided Voter​s: "To put them in perspective, I think​ of being​ on an airplane.​ The flight attendant comes​ down the aisle​ with her food cart and, eventually,​ parks​ it beside my seat.​ “Can I inter​est you in the chick​en?​” she asks.​ “Or would​ you prefer the platter of shit with bits of broke​n glass​ in it?”
To be undecided in this elect​ion is to pause​ for a moment and then ask how the chick​en is cooked." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "You can suffer the pain of change or suffer remaining the way you are." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "Try a thing you haven't done three times. Once to get over the fear of doing it. Twice to learn how to do it. And a third time to figure out whether you like it or not." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "Stop being tomented by everyone else's reaction to you." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "You can not live your life just based on what everyone else thinks." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "It is not as important how we start (our past), but how we finish." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "There are no drive-thru breakthroughs. Breakthroughs take time." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "When you are tempted to give up, your breakthrough is probably just around the corner." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "80% of people's problems are about how they feel about themselves." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "If you think anyone is sane you just don't know enough about them." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Only cops and vampires have to have an invitation to enter." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "I've seen more intelligence in the crotch lice of harem whores." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Shoes off in the whale! And don't try and make a break for the anus." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "You bitch! You killed me! You suck!" -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Christopher Moore
Jeanette add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "I love you above all things, even pie." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Eric Jerome Dickey
item.description: "a full moon is a flashlight so everyone can see your drama!" -- Eric Jerome Dickey

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Eric Jerome Dickey
item.description: "safety and love are both illusions!" -- Eric Jerome Dickey

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Eric Jerome Dickey
item.description: "hate isn't healthy, it damages the hater more than the one who's hated!" -- Eric Jerome Dickey

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Alcoholics Anonymous
item.description: "One day at a time." -- Alcoholics Anonymous

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Christianity is merely a system for turning priestesses into handmaidens, queens into concubines, and goddesses into muses." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "People are never perfect, but love can be. " -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Religion is not merely the opium of the masses, it's the cyanide." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Jeanette add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "To diminish the worth of women, men had to diminish the worth of the moon. They had to drive a wedge between human beings and the trees and the beasts and the waters, because trees and beasts and waters are as loyal to the moon as to the sun. They had to drive a wedge between thought and feeling...At first they used Apollo as the wedge, and the abstract logic of Apollo made a mighty wedge, indeed, but Apollo the artist maintained a love for women, not the open, unrestrained lust that Pan has, but a controlled longing that undermined the patriarchal ambition. When Christ came along, Christ, who slept with no female...Christ, who played no musical instrument, recited no poetry, and never kicked up his heels by moonlight, this Christ was the perfect wedge. Christianity is merely a system for turning priestesses into handmaidens, queens into concubines, and goddesses into muses." -- Tom Robbins
